auth.emailOrPasswordIncorrect: The email or password you entered is incorrect

registration.title: Candidate Registration
registration.registrationSuccessfulDescription: Your candidate profile has been created.

legalStatements.termsAgreement: By clicking on the Sign-up button you agree to ReadyToWork's Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. All your data doesn't appear to job seekers and protected with our Privacy Policy.
legalStatements.platformDisclaimer: I acknowledge that ReadyToWork.sa provides access to published professional data only and does not act as a recruitment agency or intermediary. I accept full responsibility for verifying candidate information, complying with Saudi Labor Law, and any engagement, communication, or contractual arrangement entered into outside the platform.
legalStatements.dataUsageAgreement: I agree not to misuse, copy, resell, or commercially exploit any data accessed through ReadyToWork.sa outside the scope of my active subscription and in violation of the platform's Terms & Conditions.

skillSearch.label: Search your Job Role or Skill *
skillSearch.placeholder: Type to search (e.g., Mason, Engineer, Electrician...)
skillSearch.minChars: Type at least 2 characters to search

jobRole.description: Search and select your primary job role or skill. This will help us match you with relevant opportunities.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {minLength} characters long
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
validation.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

hero.title: Saudi Recruitment Agency and Talent Souring Portal
hero.subtitle: Faster Ways to Find the Right Talent & Job
hero.description: One platform that gives you everything you need to fill your talent or job needs. If you are looking for verified talent, Ready to Work has it all. Find the perfect match for your team or your career today.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.subtitle: Search over 30,475 skilled candidates ready to work.

majorDisciplines.title: Explore job by Major Discipline
majorDisciplines.subtitle: Our platform connects you with top employers across various industries

uploadResume.title: Put Your CV In Front Of Great Employers
uploadResume.description: Take the next step in your career with confidence. Share your CV and let top employers find you based on your skills, experience, and potential.

blog.title: Our Blog: Your Path to Career Success
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest trends in hiring and career success

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Have a Question?
faq.description: Save time with straightforward answers to common questions that business managers and HR teams often ask.
faq.contactUsDescription: Get in touch and we'll take care of the rest.

freeTrial.question: How does the free trial work?
freeTrial.answer: You get full access to all features for 14 days, no credit card required.

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelSubscription.answer: Yes, you can cancel or upgrade at any time.

linkedinIntegration.question: Does Ready to Work integrate with LinkedIn?
linkedinIntegration.answer: Yes, we offer seamless LinkedIn integration for profile imports.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security practices.

customizeWorkflows.question: Can I customize workflows?
customizeWorkflows.answer: Absolutely! Our platform offers flexible workflow customization.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our Newsletter
newsletter.privacyText: We care about your data, read our privacy policy.

candidatesPage.noCandidatesDescription: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.
candidatesPage.searchErrorDescription: {error}. Please try again or browse all candidates.
candidatesPage.noCandidatesDescriptionSearch: Try adjusting your search query or browse all candidates.

searchErrors.unauthorized: Please log in to search candidates
searchErrors.notSupported: You do not have permission to search

intro.title: Flexible Pricing for Every Team Size
intro.description: Find the right talent without complexity. Our pricing plans are designed to support different client requirements, giving you flexibility, clarity, and access to qualified candidates when you need it.

features.basicFilters: Use basic filters (age, experience, location, language)
features.contactUnlock: Access contact details of {count} selected candidate{plural} after interviews
features.customRespondQuestions: Respond to up to 10 employer questions
features.customAccessContact: Access contact details of one candidate

toasts.creditsAddedDescription: You now have {interviewCredits} interview credits and {contactCredits} contact unlock credits.
toasts.purchaseFailedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

phoneVerification.title: Verify Your Phone Number
phoneVerification.description: We've sent a verification code to your phone. Please enter it below to complete your registration.
phoneVerification.verifiedDescription: Your phone number has been verified successfully.
phoneVerification.verificationSuccessfulLoginFailed: Verification successful, but login failed. Please log in manually.

messages.registrationSuccessfulDescription: Please verify your phone number to continue.
messages.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

ourWork.title: Our Work
ourWork.description: We know that finding the right candidates is a complex and time-consuming task. Our solution integrates video technology, smart tools, efficient workflows, analytics, and collaborative feedback to streamline and optimize the hiring process.

step1.title: Create account
step1.description: Sign up in minutes and set up your personal profile to get started.

step2.title: Upload CV / Resume
step2.description: Add your CV and key details so employers can explore your experience and skills.

step3.title: Get matched & shortlisted
step3.description: We match you with relevant employers in your field.

step4.title: Meet potential employer & get Moving
step4.description: Meet and move forward with the employer that's right for you.

contact.label: Contact us
contact.title: Need help? Contact us, and we'll respond soon.
contact.description: Reach out to us for any questions, support, or collaboration opportunities, we're always happy to assist!
